name: Snapmaker 2 A150
pre_gcode: G1 X-10 Y-10 F3000 ;Move to corner
G1 Z0 F1800 ;Go to zero offset
G1 E20 F200 ;Feed filament to clear nozzle
post_gcode: G1 E-1 F300 ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G1 Z{z_max} E-1 F3000 ;move Z up a bit and retract filament even more
G1 X0 F3000 ;move X to min endstops, so the head is out of the way
; PLEASE CHECK: G1 Y{machine_depth} F3000 ;so the head is out of the way and Plate is moved forward
